languages.text: После победы на Эпитафии Арджента покинула Вольного Торговца. В ее душе все ярче разгоралось ненасытное пламя, жажда возмездия. Сестра отправилась в личный крестовый поход. Сначала она выискивала и истребляла оставшихся последователей Последнего восхода, затем — тех, кто им помогал, а после — вообще всех, в ком видела тень ереси. Никакие силы не могли остановить Ардженту, облаченную в святую броню, — даже когда она обращала свой гнев против целых городов. След крови и огня протянулся за нею через Простор и оборвался на Салис Прайм. Неизвестно, зачем сестра в третий раз отправилась на планету, где когда-то отыскала свою реликвию, но, спустившись туда, она загадочным образом исчезла.

After the victory on Epitaph, Argenta left the Rogue Trader. An insatiable flame burned brighter and brighter in her soul, hungry for vengeance, and so the sister embarked on her own personal crusade. At first, she hunted and exterminated the remaining followers of the Final Dawn, then she pursued those who had abetted them, and then anyone in whom she saw a hint of heresy. Even when she directed her wrath against entire cities, no power could stop Argenta, clad in her sacred armour. She left a trail of fire and blood across the Expanse, a trail that ended on Salis Prime. No one knows why the sister returned for a third time to the planet where she had found her relic, but, after descending to its surface, she mysteriously vanished.
languages.original_text: После победы на Эпитафии Арджента покинула Вольного Торговца. В ее душе все ярче разгоралось ненасытное пламя, жажда возмездия. Сестра отправилась в личный крестовый поход. Сначала она выискивала и истребляла оставшихся последователей Последнего восхода, затем — тех, кто им помогал, а после — вообще всех, в ком видела тень ереси. Никакие силы не могли остановить Ардженту, облаченную в святую броню, — даже когда она обращала свой гнев против целых городов. След крови и огня протянулся за нею через Простор и оборвался на Салис Прайм. Неизвестно, зачем сестра в третий раз отправилась на планету, где когда-то отыскала свою реликвию, но, спустившись туда, она загадочным образом исчезла.

traits.locale_text: After the victory on Epitaph, Argenta left Rogue Trader. In her soul, an insatiable flame burned brighter and brighter, hungry for vengeance. The Sister embarked on her personal crusade. At first, she hunted and exterminated the remaining followers of the Final Dawn, then those who assisted them, and then anyone in whom she saw a hint of heresy. No power could stop Argenta, clad in sacred armour, even when she directed her wraith against entire cities. A trail of fire and blood followed her around the Expanse and ended on Salis Prime. It is not known why the Sister ventured to the planet, where she once found her relic, for the third time. But after she descended on this world, she mysteriously vanished.

languages.text: 在荒垄碑碣的胜利之后，阿洁塔离开了行商浪人。永远无法满足的复仇之火在她的灵魂里愈烧愈亮，这位修女开始了她自己的远征。起初，她消灭了终末黎明邪教的所有残党，在那之后，她开始追捕那些曾向邪教伸出援手的人，之后开始追捕一切她认为有异端迹象的人。身穿神圣盔甲的阿洁塔势不可挡，即便她的怒火烧过了整座城市，也没有任何力量能够阻止她。她的脚步踏遍了科罗努斯扩区，留下一串串带着烈焰与鲜血的足迹，一路延伸到萨利斯主星。没有人知道这位修女为什么要第三次返回她发现圣物的那颗行星，但当她来到了那颗行星之后，便神秘地失踪了。
languages.original_text: After the victory on Epitaph, Argenta left the Rogue Trader. An insatiable flame burned brighter and brighter in her soul, hungry for vengeance, and so the sister embarked on her own personal crusade. At first, she hunted and exterminated the remaining followers of the Final Dawn, then she pursued those who had abetted them, and then anyone in whom she saw a hint of heresy. Even when she directed her wrath against entire cities, no power could stop Argenta, clad in her sacred armour. She left a trail of fire and blood across the Expanse, a trail that ended on Salis Prime. No one knows why the sister returned for a third time to the planet where she had found her relic, but, after descending to its surface, she mysteriously vanished.

traits.locale_text: 在荒垄碑碣的胜利之后，阿洁塔离开了行商浪人。永远无法满足的复仇之火在她的灵魂里愈烧愈亮，这位修女开始了她自己的远征。起初，她消灭了终末黎明邪教的所有残党，在那之后，她开始追捕那些曾向邪教伸出援手的人，之后开始追捕一切她认为有异端迹象的人。身穿神圣盔甲的阿洁塔势不可挡，即便她的怒火烧过了整座城市，也没有任何力量能够阻止她。她的脚步踏遍了科罗努斯扩区，留下一串串带着烈焰与鲜血的足迹，一路延伸到萨利斯主星。没有人知道这位修女为什么要第三次返回她发现圣物的那颗行星，但当她来到了那颗行星之后，便神秘地失踪了。

languages.text: Nach dem Sieg auf Epitaph verließ Argenta {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}. Eine unersättliche Flamme loderte immer heller in ihrer Seele, gierig nach Rache, und so begann die Schwester ihren ganz persönlichen Kreuzzug. Zunächst jagte sie die verbliebenen Anhänger der Letzten Dämmerung und löschte sie aus. Dann verfolgte sie alle, die dem Kult geholfen hatten, und dann jeden, in dem sie auch nur einen Funken von Ketzerei erkannte. Selbst, wenn sie ihren Zorn gegen ganze Städte richtete, konnte keine Kraft Argenta in ihrer heiligen Rüstung aufhalten. Sie hinterließ in der Ausdehnung eine Spur von Feuer und Blut, eine Spur, die auf Salis Prime endete. Niemand weiß, warum die Schwester ein drittes Mal auf den Planeten zurückgekehrt ist, auf dem sie ihr Relikt gefunden hatte, doch nachdem sie auf der Oberfläche gelandet war, verschwand sie spurlos.
languages.original_text: After the victory on Epitaph, Argenta left the Rogue Trader. An insatiable flame burned brighter and brighter in her soul, hungry for vengeance, and so the sister embarked on her own personal crusade. At first, she hunted and exterminated the remaining followers of the Final Dawn, then she pursued those who had abetted them, and then anyone in whom she saw a hint of heresy. Even when she directed her wrath against entire cities, no power could stop Argenta, clad in her sacred armour. She left a trail of fire and blood across the Expanse, a trail that ended on Salis Prime. No one knows why the sister returned for a third time to the planet where she had found her relic, but, after descending to its surface, she mysteriously vanished.

traits.locale_text: Nach dem Sieg auf Epitaph verließ Argenta {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}. Eine unersättliche Flamme loderte immer heller in ihrer Seele, gierig nach Rache. Die Schwester begab sich auf ihren eigenen Kreuzzug. Zunächst jagte sie die verbliebenen Anhänger der Letzten Dämmerung und löschte sie aus. Dann jagte sie jene, die ihnen geholfen hatten, und dann jeden, in dem sie auch nur den kleinsten Funken Ketzerei zu erkennen glaubte. Selbst, wenn sie ihren Zorn gegen ganze Städte richtete, konnte keine Kraft Argenta in ihrer heiligen Rüstung aufhalten. Eine Spur von Feuer und Blut folgte ihr durch die Ausdehnung und endete auf Salis Prime. Niemand weiß, warum die Schwester ein drittes Mal auf den Planeten zurückgekehrt ist, auf dem sie ihr Relikt gefunden hatte, doch nachdem sie auf der Oberfläche gelandet war, verschwand sie spurlos.

languages.text: Argenta prit congé {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} après la victoire sur Épitaphe. Mue par un feu inextinguible qui brûlait de plus en plus vivement dans son âme en proie à la vengeance, la Sœur se lança dans une croisade personnelle. Elle commença par traquer et exterminer les derniers fidèles de l'Aube finale, puis elle poursuivit ceux qui leur avaient prêté assistance avant de châtier quiconque présentait le moindre penchant hérétique. Rien ne pouvait arrêter Argenta revêtue de son armure sacrée, même lorsqu'elle tournait sa fureur contre des villes entières. La traînée de feu et de sang qui la suivait dans les Étendues s'acheva cependant sur Salis Primus. Personne ne sut jamais pourquoi la sœur retourna une troisième fois sur la planète où elle avait trouvé sa relique, mais elle disparut mystérieusement après s'être posée à sa surface.
languages.original_text: After the victory on Epitaph, Argenta left the Rogue Trader. An insatiable flame burned brighter and brighter in her soul, hungry for vengeance, and so the sister embarked on her own personal crusade. At first, she hunted and exterminated the remaining followers of the Final Dawn, then she pursued those who had abetted them, and then anyone in whom she saw a hint of heresy. Even when she directed her wrath against entire cities, no power could stop Argenta, clad in her sacred armour. She left a trail of fire and blood across the Expanse, a trail that ended on Salis Prime. No one knows why the sister returned for a third time to the planet where she had found her relic, but, after descending to its surface, she mysteriously vanished.

Mue par un feu inextinguible qui brûlait de plus en plus vivement dans son âme en proie à la vengeance, la Sœur se lança dans une croisade personnelle. Elle commença par traquer et exterminer les derniers fidèles de l'Aube finale, puis elle poursuivit ceux qui leur avaient prêté assistance avant de châtier quiconque présentait le moindre penchant hérétique. Rien ne pouvait arrêter Argenta revêtue de son armure sacrée, même lorsqu'elle tournait sa fureur contre des villes entières. La traînée de feu et de sang qui la suivait dans les Étendues s'acheva cependant sur Salis Primus. Personne ne sut jamais pourquoi la Sœur retourna une troisième fois sur la planète où elle avait trouvé sa relique, mais elle disparut mystérieusement après s'être posée à sa surface.

languages.text: Tras la victoria en Epitafio, Argenta abandonó a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Una llama insaciable ardía con más fuerza que nunca en su alma, hambrienta de venganza, y empujó a la Hermana a embarcarse en su propia cruzada. Al principio, dio caza y exterminó a los seguidores restantes del Amanecer Final. Después persiguió a todos los que los apoyaron, y, por fin, a cualquiera que demostrara el más mínimo indicio de herejía. Ni siquiera cuando su ira castigaba ciudades enteras era posible detenerla gracias a su armadura sagrada. Un rastro de fuego y sangre la siguió por toda la Extensión hasta perderse en Salis Prime. Nadie sabe por qué volvió la Hermana por tercera vez al planeta en el que encontró su reliquia, pero, después de descender a la superficie, se desvaneció por completo.
languages.original_text: After the victory on Epitaph, Argenta left the Rogue Trader. An insatiable flame burned brighter and brighter in her soul, hungry for vengeance, and so the sister embarked on her own personal crusade. At first, she hunted and exterminated the remaining followers of the Final Dawn, then she pursued those who had abetted them, and then anyone in whom she saw a hint of heresy. Even when she directed her wrath against entire cities, no power could stop Argenta, clad in her sacred armour. She left a trail of fire and blood across the Expanse, a trail that ended on Salis Prime. No one knows why the sister returned for a third time to the planet where she had found her relic, but, after descending to its surface, she mysteriously vanished.

La Hermana se embarcó en su propia cruzada. Al principio, dio caza y exterminó a los seguidores restantes del Amanecer Final. Después persiguió a todos los que los apoyaron, y, por fin, a cualquiera que demostrara el más mínimo indicio de herejía. Ni siquiera cuando su ira castigaba ciudades enteras era posible detenerla gracias a su armadura sagrada. Un rastro de fuego y sangre la siguió por toda la Extensión hasta perderse en Salis Prime. Nadie sabe por qué volvió la Hermana por tercera vez al planeta en el que encontró su reliquia, pero, después de descender a la superficie, se desvaneció por completo.

languages.text: エピタフで勝利を収めると、アルジェンタは自由開拓者のもとを離れた。その魂は煌々たる炎を飽きることなく燃え上がらせつつも復讐に飢えていたために、シスターは自らの聖戦へと向かったのだ。アルジェンタはまず、最後の夜明けの残党を探しだして掃討した。さらに残党の協力者を狩り、異端信仰の兆しを見せた者を残らず葬り去った。彼女の怒りが街全体に向けられたときでさえ、聖なる鎧をまとうアルジェンタを止められる者はなかった。エクスパンスのいたるところで、彼女の後には炎と血の轍が、サリス・プライムへの道が刻まれていった。このシスターが信仰を得た惑星に3度も戻ってきた理由を知る者はなかったが、アルジェンタはただこの星に降り立った。そしてその後の消息は杳として知れなかった。
languages.original_text: After the victory on Epitaph, Argenta left the Rogue Trader. An insatiable flame burned brighter and brighter in her soul, hungry for vengeance, and so the sister embarked on her own personal crusade. At first, she hunted and exterminated the remaining followers of the Final Dawn, then she pursued those who had abetted them, and then anyone in whom she saw a hint of heresy. Even when she directed her wrath against entire cities, no power could stop Argenta, clad in her sacred armour. She left a trail of fire and blood across the Expanse, a trail that ended on Salis Prime. No one knows why the sister returned for a third time to the planet where she had found her relic, but, after descending to its surface, she mysteriously vanished.

languages.text: Sinyazıt'taki zaferin ardından Argenta, Hür Tacir'in yanından ayrıldı. Ruhundaki dindirilemez ateş; her geçen gün daha da hararetle yanıyor, intikam açlığı çekiyordu. Rahibe, kişisel cihadını tamamlamak üzere yola çıktı. İlk başta Nihai Şafak'ın kalan takipçilerini avlayıp ortadan kaldırdı, ardından onların yardakçılarının ve en ufak bir kâfirlik belirtisi gösteren herkesin peşine düştü. Öfkesini koca şehirlere yönlendirdiğinde bile hiçbir güç, kutsal zırhını kuşanmış Argenta'yı durduramıyordu. Enginlik'in her yanından ardında ateşten ve kandan izler bıraktı. İzler, Salis Prime'da son buldu. Yadigârını bulduğu gezegene üçüncü kez dönme sebebini kimse bilmiyor. Rahibe, yüzeye iniş yaptıktan sonra gizemli bir şekilde ortadan kayboldu.
languages.original_text: After the victory on Epitaph, Argenta left the Rogue Trader. An insatiable flame burned brighter and brighter in her soul, hungry for vengeance, and so the sister embarked on her own personal crusade. At first, she hunted and exterminated the remaining followers of the Final Dawn, then she pursued those who had abetted them, and then anyone in whom she saw a hint of heresy. Even when she directed her wrath against entire cities, no power could stop Argenta, clad in her sacred armour. She left a trail of fire and blood across the Expanse, a trail that ended on Salis Prime. No one knows why the sister returned for a third time to the planet where she had found her relic, but, after descending to its surface, she mysteriously vanished.

traits.locale_text: Kitabe'deki zaferin ardından Argenta, Hür Tacir'in yanından ayrıldı. Ruhundaki dindirilemez ateş her geçen gün daha da hararetle yanıyor, intikam açlığı çekiyordu. Rahibe kişisel bir din savaşı vermek için yola çıktı. İlk başta Nihai Şafak'ın kalan takipçilerini avlayıp yok etti, ardından onların yardakçılarının peşine düştü, ardından da en ufak bir kâfirlik belirtisi gösteren herkesin. Öfkesini şehirlerin tamamına yönlendirdiğinde bile hiçbir güç, kutsal zırhını kuşanmış Argenta'yı durduramıyordu. Enginlik boyunca arkasında ateşten ve kandan bir iz bıraktı ve bu iz, Salis Prime'da son buldu. Yadigârını bulduğu gezegene üçüncü kez neden döndüğünü kimse bilmiyor ancak rahibe, yüzeye iniş yaptıktan sonra gizemli bir şekilde ortadan kayboldu.
